document.full_text: a storm blew through doral on thursday forcing a delay that caused the first round to be suspended by darkness and slowed hunter mahan?s strong start.
document.title: sports briefing | golf: big storm spoils round at doral
lines_and_colors: a storm blew through doral on thursday forcing a delay that caused the first round to be suspended by darkness and slowed hunter mahan?s strong start.
